prefuse.util.ui
类 JPrefuseTree

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JTree
                  prefuse.util.ui.JPrefuseTree
所有已实现的接口：
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable
public class JPrefuseTree
extends javax.swing.JTree

Swing component that displays a prefuse Tree instance in a Swing JTree component. Graph instances can also be displayed by first getting a Tree instance with the Graph.getSpanningTree() method.

作者：
jeffrey heer
另请参见：
JTree, 序列化表格

嵌套类摘要
 class JPrefuseTree.PrefuseTreeModel
          TreeModel implementation that provides an adapter to a backing prefuse Tree instance.

JPrefuseTree

public JPrefuseTree(Tree t,
                    java.lang.String labelField)
Create a new JPrefuseTree.

参数：
t - the Tree to display
labelField - the data field used to privde labels
方法详细信息

getTree

public Tree getTree()
Return the backing Tree instance.

返回：

convertValueToText

public java.lang.String convertValueToText(java.lang.Object value,
                                           boolean selected,
                                           boolean expanded,
                                           boolean leaf,
                                           int row,
                                           boolean hasFocus)
Returns a String label for Node instances by looking up the label data field specified in the constructor of this class.

覆盖：
类 javax.swing.JTree 中的 convertValueToText
另请参见：
JTree.convertValueToText(java.lang.Object, boolean, boolean, boolean, int, boolean)

showTreeWindow

public static javax.swing.JFrame showTreeWindow(Tree t,
                                                java.lang.String labelField)
Create a new window displaying the contents of the input Tree as a Swing JTree.

参数：
t - the Tree instance to display
labelField - the data field to use for labeling nodes
返回：
a reference to the JFrame holding the tree view
